cause.description:
Every year now the governement chrages the world taxes, complaining about not having enough money to help the country the raise taxes another 2%, ande for most people now a days it's hard to get enough money!
I feel that the government should be stopped or at least have a on time tax price that can never go up..... I'm here to make from America to Zimbabway tax free!
1. No taxes!
2. More freedom!
3. LESS GOVERNMENT!
cause.mission: Stop taxes world wide and live happier
cause.name: Bringing down the government- No more taxes!
